workout_items.name: Test: Cardio
workout_items.info:
Run 5km and record your time. This can be done outside or on a treadmill. 

There is no judgement here. This is purely a time to refer to in future months to come. Our aim is to vastly improve your cardio ability, getting your time down and your distances up.

workout_items.name: Hip Opening - Stage 1
workout_items.info:
Complete this hip opening sequence to start laying the foundations to the middle splits. 

- 10 Side To Sides each leg
- Standing Pancake
- 10 Side To Sides each leg
- Side Lean each leg ( 1 min )
- Pigeon Hold each leg (2 mins)

workout.short_description:
Conditioning & Middle Splits

A) Test: Cardio
B) Hip Opening - Stage 1
workout.title: Conditioning & Middle Splits
workout.warmup:
(Warm Up)
3 sets;

30s Hip Flexor Stretch
10 Side To Sides (Each Leg)
